name: Lo-fi Crush
description:
A colour match rhythm game. 

Available at: https://solus-games.itch.io/lo-fi-crush

Feedback Questionnaire: https://forms.gle/NG6dtg6TDbMG6pBp8

6 levels, showcasing 2 auto-generated Lo-fi and 4 bespoke Lo-fi tracks. 

The levels are currently numbered in order I developed them. In later levels, different parts of the track will fade in when on a streak. Should you miss a note, only the part you're playing will play until a streak is built up. 

This upload is for playtesting purposes

Size zipped: 764MB

Size Unzipped:: 929MB
